text:
Message 3349 of 4024
Watching the documentary on Netflix. It’s interesting of course, but in a weird way to me. All these people who were happy, and did not want to
blow up their home life, their family, all they had worked for. But after ten years, they lost their spark. The bedroom just was not happening anymore.
So they did this.
Crazy. Crazy. It makes me reflect of course. Especially on my pleas for counseling last spring. We were the opposite. We had it all. And bed was
unquestionably the hottest and most incredibly intimate place we could be. After 30 years it could not have been better. Crazy. Crazy. At least we
went out on top there.
And then we blew up everything else that mattered.
Crazy
Crazy
Sent:06/22/2024 at 07:34 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 06/23/2024 at 06:43 AM)
Subject:Ashely Madison
Message 3350 of 4024
Alright, you're doing your daily thing where you ask a question and immediately log off, so by the time I hit send with the answer a minute later (and
you know I am sending it within a minute) you are long gone and won't check in again.
I asked for peaceful collaboration using non-violent communication as the tool (since I read the nook as recommended) to work on some important
kid related dispute resolution that will be stuck in our lawyers for weeks to come. You refuse to work with me again.
There is literally nothing I can do to get you to work with me constructively or even so much as communicate in an unhealthy way. I say unhealthy
because just getting back to that would be a major improvement over the way you do it today which is almost non-existent.
• During the work week you always have an excuse not to parent with me.
• During the weekend you always have an excuse not to parent with me.
You honestly parent like you plan on me dying and will never see our kids again. Please do not complain if we do not reach any decisions that the
lawyers are negotiating now. I tried again.
Sent:06/22/2024 at 08:52 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 06/23/2024 at 06:33 AM)
Subject:Re: Have a sec?
Message 3351 of 4024
See Andy’s guidelines. 100 word limit and time to respond.
I’m not going to meet in person or chat.
Any ask is peppered with statements that have accusations. Given I know your aggressive position I’m not going to engage as that’s when anger comes
Sent:06/23/2024 at 06:43 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 06/27/2024 at 02:31 PM)
Subject:Re: Have a sec?
